Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Brewers lead 1-0 in a three-game series with the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Arizona is 82-65 overall and 41-32 in home games.
Milwaukee has a 43-33 record on the road and an 85-62 record overall.
The teams meet Saturday for the second time this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers have a 43-33 record on the road.
The Diamondbacks hitters have a collective.336 on-base percentage, the top percentage in the NL.
The Brewers hitters are batting a collective.248, which ranks fifth in the NL.
Others: Tobias Myers (7-5, 2.93 ERA, 1.16 WHIP, 112 strikeouts) will start for the Brewers.
Brandon Pfaadt (9-8, 4.42 ERA, 1.22 WHIP, 160 strikeouts) will start for the Diamondbacks.
